settings.content: Be part of Mokwheel, and help us deliver the spirit of free riding to every street, every city.

No amount of data beats a real ride.
At our stores, you can feel the build, sense the power. Two legs. One bike. One short ride.
Our dealers are trained experts who can help by understanding your needs and guide you towards the perfect ebike along with answering any questions you may have.

settings.faqs_question: What type of vehicle is Granite? Who is it suitable for?
settings.faqs_answer: Granite is an electric folding tricycle designed for users who need high stability, low-span structure and large load capacity. It is suitable for middle-aged and elderly riders, users with poor balance or those who need to carry goods.

settings.faqs_question: Can the tricycle be folded? Does it take up a lot of space for storage?
settings.faqs_answer: Granite uses a foldable main frame + detachable rear wheel structure. After folding, the volume is 43" x 32" x 30", which is a very compact size among tricycles and is easy to store at home or in the garage.

settings.faqs_question: Does the Granite have a differential? What does it do?
settings.faqs_answer:
es, the Granite rear axle is equipped with a differential structure that allows the two rear wheels to turn independently when turning.
This means:

Smoother turning, no outside pull, no inside slip.

Reduce tire wear and extend tire life.

Improve handling safety, especially when turning with a small radius or heavy loads.

settings.faqs_question: Is it tiring to ride? Is it suitable for women or people with average physical strength?
settings.faqs_answer: Granite has a low step-over design, which makes riding easy and the power assist is adjustable. It is not strenuous even when carrying goods. It is suitable for people with average leg strength or those who seek easy travel.

settings.faqs_question: Is it troublesome to fold and unfold? Will it become loose if folded frequently?
settings.faqs_answer: The folding structure has been tested many times, and the folding/unfolding process is smooth and reliable. It is recommended to check the folding lock for looseness every month during daily use to ensure riding safety.

settings.faqs_question: Do I need to install it myself?
settings.faqs_answer: The important parts are pre-installed when the vehicle leaves the factory. You only need to install the front wheel, handlebars, pedals and other parts according to the instructions and videos. You can also get help by contacting our after-sales team or offline stores.

settings.content: Additionally, the trike features a few uncommon line items on its spec sheet that stood out in comparison with other similar models we‚Äôve tested. Its down tube carries a relatively high-capacity 48V, 720-Wh battery, which we expected would lend the Granite better-than-average range.

The Granite offers a comfortable and stable ride, thanks to its adjustable suspension and wide wheelbase.The powerful motor
provides ample power for hills and city streets.

Three-wheel hydraulic disc brakes might seem like overkill,but they deliver confident stopping power that makes sense for a fully loaded trike.
The parking brake feature is a nice touch that comes in handy when loading up cargo or taking a breather on slight inclines.

settings.title: I am a YouTube content creator, I am 73 years old and I review E Bikes and trikes for manufacturers.

The Granite eTrike is the best eTrike I‚Äôve had the pleasure to ride, review and own.
Mokwheel‚Äôs detail to design and choice in parts used to build this awesome eTrike is second to none.

I thoroughly loved reviewing the mock wheel granite trike, very sturdy, dependable stable, and I really like the road tires instead of the knobby tires.
Has great torque, very smooth ride, great saddle, and very easy assembly.
It‚Äôs also has a class 2 rating which means it has a top speed of 20mph. The triple hydraulic braking system is another first for me to see on an eTrike.
This bike is great for family outings. The balance makes it easy for everyone to keep up, and the motor helps on the tougher parts.
The bike is exactly what I needed. The 860W motor is perfect for my daily commute, and the battery lasts long enough to get me through the whole day.
This Electric Tricycle Changed My Daily Commute FOREVER! Watch as I ride the Mokwheel Granite!
Mokwheel Granite E-Trike Review, 2024 - The New Trike on the Block
Mokwheel Granite Review | Is This E-Trike Solid as a Rock?

settings.title: How long until I receive my bike?
settings.rich_content: The order will be process in 48 business hours. Once the order has shipped, a shipping confirmation email will be sent to your email. We use FedEx or UPS for shipping. Please allow 2~7 business days for the shipment to arrive to your designated location. Any delivery dates provided by Mokwheel are estimates.

settings.title: Do I need a license for riding Ebike?
settings.rich_content: No, you don‚Äôt need a license for riding Ebike. Please read Safety Instructions carefully for your safety.

settings.title: How do I charge my battery?
settings.rich_content: You can check the Battery and Charger of our E-BIKE USER MANUAL. The methods are listed in the manual with more detail.

settings.title: How to find the Ebike that fits me?
settings.rich_content: You can check our Compare Models for the differential of our Ebike.

settings.title: How to clean my Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We recommended you to take off the battery. Otherwise, you can clean the E-bike as the normal bike.

settings.title: What accessories come with Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We send a wrench, bicycle pump and front full fender, with our Ebike.
